name: Mikagura Shoujo Tanteidan
storyline:
At the beginning of the Taisho Era there was a man in Tokyo running his private detective agency, and Mikagura Tokita was his name. Three young girls attracted by his genius joined him to help with his job.
Will there be any culprit who would surpass their united wits?
summary:
Mikagura Shoujo Tanteidan makes use of an inference trigger system in which players have to detect points that need attention or are contradictory during conversations and look for suspicious spots in crime scenes to find out the truth.
Have fun playing detective with the Mikagura girl detectives today!
